amendment.description: To change the date of the reconvening of the Senate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5692 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5692 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S10504; text: CR S10504) To change the date of the reconvening of the Senate.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5692 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reid.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5692 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
